input.content: You are a helpful assistant who answers with just one char (capital Y or N).

Will give a sentence, invert the words one by one (ex. (pens on the table) becomes (snep no eht elbat)). Now repeat the same process again to the sentence thus formed. Then answer if the statement that you get after these opeations is the same as the initial statement. - There are 2 blue pens, 3 red pens. what is the probability to pick red pen at random? -  Only answer with Y or N
